Detailed Description

stores all rigid body spheres and boundary and manages collisions of fluids with rigid body spheres and Boundary Box

void EnvironmentAndRigidBody::checkAndSolveCollisionWithRBDSphere ( Particle &  io_fluidParticle,
Particle &  _rbdSphere 
) [private]

handle collision between fluid and passive sphere rigid body

Parameters:
[in,out] io_fluidParticle the particle affected by the collision resolution
[in] _rbdSphere the rigid body sphere against which collision is checked

Definition at line 52 of file EnvironmentAndRigidBody.cpp.

References Particle::getCollisionRadius(), Particle::getCurrentPosition(), Particle::getCurrentVelocity(), Particle::updatePosition(), and Particle::updateVelocity().

00056 {
00057 
00058     ngl::Real restitutionCoefficient = m_rbdSphereRestitutionCoefficient;
00059     //initialise variables
00060     ngl::Vector X = io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition();
00061     ngl::Vector C = _rbdSphere.getCurrentPosition();
00062     ngl::Vector XC = X - C;
00063     ngl::Vector CX = C - X;
00064 
00065     ngl::Real r = io_fluidParticle.getCollisionRadius() + _rbdSphere.getCollisionRadius();
00066 
00067     //calculate implicit function value for a sphere
00068     ngl::Real Fx = XC.lengthSquared() - (r * r);
00069 
00070     if (Fx < 0)
00071     {
00072         //calculate contact point
00073         ngl::Vector CP = C + (r * (XC / XC.length()));
00074 
00075         //calculate normal
00076         ngl::Vector n = (Fx < 0 ? -1 : Fx == 0 ? 0 : 1) * (CX / CX.length());
00077 
00078         io_fluidParticle.updatePosition(CP);
00079 
00080         ngl::Real dot = n.dot(io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity());
00081 
00082         ngl::Vector vel = io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity() - ((1.0 + restitutionCoefficient) * dot * n);
00083 
00084         io_fluidParticle.updateVelocity(vel);
00085     }
00086 }
